verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְיָשֻׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Shu-vu, that they turn וְיַחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> ve-ya-cha-Nu and encamp לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before פִּ֣י pi הַחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> ha-chi-Rot, Pihahiroth בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between מִגְדֹּ֖ל <S%H4024><s%> mig-Dol between Migdol וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam; and the sea לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei over against בַּ֣עַל Ba-'al צְפֹ֔ן <S%H1189><s%> tze-Fon, Baalzephon נִכְח֥וֹ <S%H5226><s%> nich-Cho before תַחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> ta-cha-Nu it shall ye encamp עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam. by the sea

וְאָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar will say פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh For Pharaoh לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נְבֻכִ֥ים <S%H943><s%> ne-vu-Chim They [are] entangled הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> hem in בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; in the land סָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gar hath shut them in עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar. the wilderness

וְחִזַּקְתִּ֣י <S%H2388><s%> ve-chiz-zak-Ti And I will harden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> lev- heart פַּרְעֹה֮ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh Pharaoh's וְרָדַ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> ve-ra-Daf that he shall follow אַחֲרֵיהֶם֒ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem after וְאִכָּבְדָ֤ה <S%H3513><s%> ve-'ik-ka-ve-Dah them and I will be honoured בְּפַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> be-far-'Oh upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and all חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2426><s%> chei-Lo, army וְיָדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U may know מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-su- And they did כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> Chen. so

וַיֻּגַּד֙ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yug-Gad And it was told לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָרַ֖ח <S%H1272><s%> va-Rach fled הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; that the people וַ֠יֵּהָפֵךְ <S%H2015><s%> Vai-ye-ha-fech was turned לְבַ֨ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav and the heart פַּרְעֹ֤ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh of Pharaoh וַעֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> va-'a-va-Dav and of his servants אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, against the people וַיֹּֽאמרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-m-Ru and they said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot we עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-nu, Why have we done כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שִׁלַּ֥חְנוּ <S%H7971><s%> shil-Lach-nu go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El this that we have let Israel מֵעָבְדֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> me-'a-ve-De-nu. from serving

וַיֶּאְסֹ֖ר <S%H631><s%> vai-ye'-Sor And he made ready אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רִכְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7393><s%> rich-Bo; his chariot וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo his people לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach and took עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. and he

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach, And he took שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> shesh- six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred רֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> re-chev chariots בָּח֔וּר <S%H970><s%> ba-Chur, young וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> Re-chev and all the chariots מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְשָׁלִשִׁ֖ם <S%H7991><s%> ve-sha-li-Shim and captains עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כֻּלּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lo. all

וַיְחַזֵּ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> vay-chaz-Zek hardened יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> lev the heart פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh of Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וַיִּרְדֹּ֕ף <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-Dof and he pursued אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel יֹצְאִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Im went out בְּיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand רָמָֽה׃ <S%H7311><s%> ra-Mah. with an high

וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-de-Fu pursued מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem, after וַיַּשִּׂ֤יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> vai-yas-Si-gu and overtook אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam חֹנִ֣ים <S%H2583><s%> cho-Nim them encamping עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, by the sea כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- them all סוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> sus them all the horses רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> Re-chev [and] chariots פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, of Pharaoh וּפָרָשָׁ֖יו <S%H6571><s%> u-fa-ra-Shav and his horsemen וְחֵיל֑וֹ <S%H2428><s%> ve-chei-Lo; and his army עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside פִּי֙ pi הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> ha-chi-Rot, beside Pihahiroth לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before בַּ֥עַל Ba-'al צְפֹֽן׃ <S%H1189><s%> tze-Fon. Baalzephon

וּפַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> u-far-'Oh And when Pharaoh הִקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> hik-Riv; drew nigh וַיִּשְׂאוּ֩ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U lifted up בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Hem their eyes וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מִצְרַ֣יִם׀ <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian נֹסֵ֣עַ <S%H5265><s%> no-Se-a' marched אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem, after וַיִּֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-re-'U afraid מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, them and they were sore וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> vai-yitz-'a-Ku cried out בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <S%H1097><s%> ha-mib-be-Li corruption אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- there קְבָרִים֙ <S%H6913><s%> ke-va-Rim Because [there were] no graves בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim, in Egypt לְקַחְתָּ֖נוּ <S%H3947><s%> le-kach-Ta-nu hast thou taken us away לָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> la-Mut to die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; desert מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- how long זֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> zoT have you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta hast thou dealt לָּ֔נוּ La-nu, לְהוֹצִיאָ֖נוּ <S%H3318><s%> le-ho-tzi-'A-nu thus with us to carry us forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. Egypt

הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh is this הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var, [Is] not this the word אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher we דִּבַּ֨רְנוּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-nu that we did tell אֵלֶ֤יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha to you בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> ve-mitz-Ra-yim thee in Egypt לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying חֲדַ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> cha-Dal Let us alone מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu alone וְנַֽעַבְדָ֣ה <S%H5647><s%> ve-na-'av-Dah that we may serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; Egyptian כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov good לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu עֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> 'a-Vod for us to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egyptian מִמֻּתֵ֖נוּ <S%H4191><s%> mi-mu-Te-nu than that we should die בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar. in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto the people אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָאוּ֒ <S%H3372><s%> ti-ra-'U Fear הִֽתְיַצְב֗וּ <S%H3320><s%> hit-yatz-Vu, ye not stand still וּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'U and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְשׁוּעַ֣ת <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'At the salvation יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh which he will shew לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; to you to day כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, for אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom רְאִיתֶ֤ם <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tem whom ye have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, to day לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֹסִ֛יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> to-Si-fu them again לִרְאֹתָ֥ם <S%H7200><s%> lir-'o-Tam ye shall see ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od more עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- no more for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. ever

יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> yil-la-Chem shall fight לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you תַּחֲרִישֽׁוּן׃ <S%H2790><s%> ta-cha-ri-Shun. for you and ye shall hold your peace פ Peh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- Why תִּצְעַ֖ק <S%H6817><s%> titz-'Ak Wherefore criest אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to דַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber thou unto me;speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְיִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> ve-yis-Sa-'u. that they go forward

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you הָרֵ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> ha-Rem But lift thou up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַטְּךָ֗ <S%H4294><s%> mat-te-Cha, thy rod וּנְטֵ֧ה <S%H5186><s%> u-ne-Teh and stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדְךָ֛ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam over the sea וּבְקָעֵ֑הוּ <S%H1234><s%> u-ve-ka-'E-hu; and divide וְיָבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> ve-ya-Vo-'u shall go בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- it and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [ground] through the midst הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam of the sea בַּיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H3004><s%> bai-yab-ba-Shah. on dry
